website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but it'll give you a comfortable ride with padding in the right places.
pros: Strong hook on the front of the board for easy towing
Includes a pad on the base and padded strap on the board
Offers better control than others with fins molded into the kneeboard to keep you on your line
cons: Design makes it tough to do certain tricks on the board

customer_reviews.title: Nice kneeboard and fits all skill levels
customer_reviews.text: This kneeboard is nice and buoyant. I've had several different people of different skill levels use this board and they all did/do well with it. We've also used this board to teach two seven year olds how to kneeboard. Buying this board was a good purchase. The adults can ride it aggressively and the kiddos have a blast on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Justin DeVoe

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter kneeboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter kneeboard. The hook makes it super easy for beginners but the design of the board is fun for people who already know what they are doing as well. I got this as an easier alternative to wakeboarding and wake surfing as those have pretty steep learning curves. Everyone who has tried this board has been able to pick up riding it very quickly and had a great time.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners board!
customer_reviews.text: Very quick ship, came as described. Got my two sons up on it within a couple tries! Tow hook works great! Kids were very stable on this board, and it was there first time ever on a knee board.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Westhorpe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice board, easy to use once you watch a youtube video.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: What I paid for this product compared to the other stuff that is out there is a good bang for your buck. Knee boarding is a lot of fun! It’s not as easy as it looks tho! There is a learning curve but when you figure it out it’s a blast. I’m a big dude and I can easily fit on this. I’m 6’ 260lbs and My friend is 6’4 240 and we both easily fit. That was my biggest worry buying this but it’s very comfy for all sizes. Happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Just do it!

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I used to kneeboard as a kid and wanted to expose my kids to the sport as well. We picked this up a few weeks ago and the very first time we took it out they got up and successfully ran around the lake a few times. The hook on the front is a huge plus, especially for younger kids without without the upper body strength.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: Great family board
customer_reviews.text: Love this bird - we are a family of beginner boaters and everyone loved this from our young 9 year old granddaughter who was able to get up quite easily after a little practice to our 6’3 tall 210 son. Love the hook, certainly simplifies the learning process
customer_reviews.author: K. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kneeboard
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love this board. I found it a tad challenging because it does not have fins but it stays on top of the water nicely. My 6 year old grandson and his cousin who is 8 got up on it the first time they tried. I like the deep knee area. The kids liked the hook on the front that they could hook the tow rope on to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda F.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Used it all last week on the lake with the kids (and me). Made well, very light, easy to learn for anyone and fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy board to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a board for beginners my daughter who is not very physical at all got up first time great board good price had to buy a knee board wakeboard hook for this board was added to the always take stuff for the boat
customer_reviews.author: johnjohn1570

customer_reviews.title: New fun you
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and his friends to try. We normally just tow a tube so I thought this would be something new to try. After watching a few videos they were able to get up and ride quite well. My son is 6 foot tall so it works for big folks too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Slow board compared to a fiberglass board
customer_reviews.text: We were able to get up easily on this board, but ultimately we were dissatisfied. If you have ever ridden on a fiberglass board, you will not like this one. I was hopeful this one would be good, but the plastic increases drag. That drag you feel in your hands and arms. It is slow to respond crossing the wake compared to fiberglass. There is no quickness to it. I returned after one try.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Like old times!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t kneeboarding since I was a kid, great board to re-learn on. Gave it 4 stars because outta the box it had deep scratches on it.
customer_reviews.author: Big John!

customer_reviews.title: It's a great board, so much fun
customer_reviews.text: We had an old board that didn't have Don's on the bottom so we upgraded to this. Very stable, thick strap. It's a great board, so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: Beginner board
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner board! The tow hook makes it so even our 5 year old can attempt to knee board!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just learning how to knee board. Well made...just what I would expect from O’Brien.
customer_reviews.author: Parkecy

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We have only gotten to use this kneeboard one weekend, but it worked perfectly. Our 11 yo and 7 yo boys both got up on the board on their first attempt. No doubt a little luck helped, but It was very stable while climbing onto and riding it.
customer_reviews.author: CGP

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: Item was a gift for Christmas. The water has still been toooo cold to give it a good try
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Solid beginner board
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely a beginner board. If you are accustomed to riding a sleeker, lighter board this would be a set back for you. The brand, design, comfort and ease is great! If you’re looking for a great beginner board this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Lulumom

customer_reviews.title: Nice knee board
customer_reviews.text: We're all beginners and this board was easy to get up on and fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great board to learn on
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginners. My 7 year old had no problem learning in this board. Not good for tricks. Pick another if you are a more advanced user.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality board
customer_reviews.text: The kneeboard is great for beginners. We love that it comes with a built in hook for the rope, makes getting on the board easier. Would recommend 👌
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: Amazing board for beginners and advanced riders. My son is 11, he and his friends all got up on 1 try. I’m 44, I’ve been able to shred with ease as well. Buy it
customer_reviews.author: Jairee5

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price. Easy to use for beginners on up. No issues after many uses and can't see any occurring in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: All in all a great beginner board. I have mostly young kids 8-10 on it and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time yesterday it’s perfect Everyone got up first time. Well balanced. 3 12 year old girls all had a great time.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of fun
customer_reviews.text: Knee board works great and kids are having lots of fun with it
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rendon

customer_reviews.title: Big fun
customer_reviews.text: Great board very comfortable and easy to use for first timers
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great product my 5 year old daughter up to my 240 pound 46 year old husband could use it! Great for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: able to make good cuts and basic tricks - the whole family is ...
customer_reviews.text: Lot's of padding, able to make good cuts and basic tricks - the whole family is loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: ... or board backwards on so its by far not favorite board ive owned
customer_reviews.text: The description and pic of bottom Didnt show it had molded fins for cutting so almost impossible to do 360s or board backwards on so its by far not favorite board ive owned !
customer_reviews.author: randy smith

customer_reviews.title: Great board for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Every kid from 5 years old and up got up on their 1st try. The younger ones just had a little trouble getting the rope off the hook. The great thing is that this board made their 1st experience a success! For older and more advance sliders the board will allow you to throw a wall of water because of the built in fins, but it is tough to hang on to the rope when you cut hard. It is a great starter board but for advanced rider the board rides low in the water and hanging on to the rope will take more effort and will tire you out faster.
customer_reviews.author: Troy A Domangue

customer_reviews.title: It works ok
customer_reviews.text: Not my kids favorite. It worked alright but they didn’t love this board.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Agnew

product_meta.title: O'Brien Voodoo Kneeboard with Hook
product_meta.description: One ride and the Voodoo will have you under its spell. With performance edges and a low-profile cross section, the Voodoo combines hard-charging edging and a forgiving ride. Quad molded fins at each corner of the hull provide extra tracking control and the curved underside makes edge transitions quick and smooth. The 3/4" thick pad provides plush comfort for your knees and the padded strap locks you in for maximum control.
